body:
This commit:
* allows Tau to automatically pick up Spack-installed `hwloc`
* patches Tau configure script so that `libunwind` library dir is set to either `${LIBUNWIND_ROOT}/lib` or `${LIBUNWIND_ROOT}/lib64` as appropriate

@sameershende @wspear @khuck
title: tau: correctly set libhwloc + libunwind library paths
